issue.title: [Rust] Document use of unsafe in parquet crate
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10984](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10984). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are ~64 uses of unsafe in the parquet crate
```java

./parquet/src/util/hash_util.rs:6
./parquet/src/util/bit_packing.rs:34
./parquet/src/util/bit_util.rs:1
./parquet/src/data_type.rs:12
./parquet/src/arrow/record_reader.rs:5
./parquet/src/arrow/array_reader.rs:8 
```
